item.description: Our guest is Megan Mulheisen a bit of a Renaissance woman because of her varying interests which include hunting, fishing, camping, reading, singing and dancing. Megan will share her outlook on dating and relationship.

item.title: EPISODE17 - Fathers Speaks to Our Princesses
item.author: mrcmarketingpam@yahoo.com
item.description: Do you know the dating code or game that males play on females? Can you recognize the a player or one who is sincere? Learn some secrets from a father who cares.

item.title: EPISODE12 - Vitamin C in Strengthening Relationships
item.author: mrcmarketingpam@yahoo.com
item.description: Our guest today will be psychologist, LaShun Franklin who will deal with the real and raw side of relationships. If you want some practical tidbits and surefire techniques to improve your relationships and identify areas that need work, this is the show to listen to.
